FlavorText.zhCN: 毒如鹤顶，刃若清刚；图穷匕现，君命难长。

HowToGetThisCard.esES: Se desbloquea al alcanzar el nivel 6.

HowToGetThisGoldCard.esES: Se desbloquea al alcanzar el nivel 45.

CardTextInHand.enUS: Deal $10 damage.
CardTextInHand.zhCN: 造成$10点伤害。

FlavorText.enUS: Take the time for an evil laugh after you draw this card.
FlavorText.zhCN: 抽到这张牌的时候，发出一阵邪恶的狂笑吧。

CardTextInHand.enUS: Battlecry: Freeze a character.
CardTextInHand.zhCN: 战吼：冻结一个角色。

FlavorText.enUS: When a Water elemental and an Ice elemental love each other VERY much...
FlavorText.zhCN: 当水元素和冰元素相爱到一定程度的时候...

CardTextInHand.enUS: Spell Damage +1. Battlecry: Draw a card.
CardTextInHand.zhCN: 法术伤害+1，战吼：抽一张牌。

FlavorText.enUS: They initially planned to be the Beryl or Cerulean drakes, but those felt a tad too pretentious.
FlavorText.zhCN: 它们本来应该是宝蓝色或是蔚蓝色，但这几个颜色显得有点太耀眼了。

CardTextInHand.enUS: Secret: When your opponent casts a spell, Counter it.
CardTextInHand.zhCN: 奥秘：当你的对手施放法术时，反制该法术。

FlavorText.enUS: What's the difference between a mage playing with Counterspell and a mage who isn't? The mage who isn't is getting Pyroblasted in the face.
FlavorText.zhCN: 一个会法术反制的法师和一个不会法术反制的法师之间有什么区别？那个不会的法师被炎爆术炸了一脸。

CardTextInHand.enUS: Secret: When your hero is attacked, gain 8 Armor.
CardTextInHand.zhCN: 奥秘：当你的英雄受到攻击时，获得8点护甲值。

FlavorText.enUS: This is Rank 1. Rank 2 is Chocolate Milk Barrier.
FlavorText.zhCN: 这只是这个技能的第一级，第二级会是...巧克力牛奶护体。

CardTextInHand.enUS: Secret: When your opponent plays a minion, summon a copy of it.
CardTextInHand.zhCN: 奥秘：当你的对手打出一张随从牌时，召唤一个该随从的复制。

FlavorText.enUS: You go first. - Krush'gor the Behemoth, to his pet boar.
FlavorText.zhCN: “你先上。”——“巨兽”克鲁什格尔对他的宠物野猪说道。

CardTextInHand.enUS: Secret: When your hero takes fatal damage, prevent it and become Immune this turn.
CardTextInHand.zhCN: 奥秘：当你的英雄将要承受致命伤害时，防止这些伤害，并使其在本回合中获得免疫。

FlavorText.enUS: Ice is nice, and will suffice!
FlavorText.zhCN: 法师们都很奇怪，为什么把一样东西塞进冰箱需要三个步骤？

CardTextInHand.enUS: Can't Attack. At the end of your turn, deal 8 damage to a random enemy.
CardTextInHand.zhCN: 无法攻击，在你的回合结束时，对一个随机敌人造成8点伤害。

FlavorText.enUS: Ragnaros was summoned by the Dark Iron dwarves, who were eventually enslaved by the Firelord. Summoning Ragnaros often doesn’t work out the way you want it to.
FlavorText.zhCN: 拉格纳罗斯是由黑铁矮人召唤出来的，而这些矮人最终也成为了火焰领主的奴隶。所以召唤拉格纳罗斯往往得不到你想要的结果。

CardTextInHand.enUS: Taunt. Battlecry: Destroy one of your Mana Crystals.
CardTextInHand.zhCN: 嘲讽，战吼：摧毁你的一个法力水晶。

FlavorText.enUS: Yes, he'll fight for you. BUT HE'S NOT GOING TO LIKE IT.
FlavorText.zhCN: 没错，他会为你而战，但并非心甘情愿。

CardTextInHand.enUS: Deal $1 damage to a minion. If that kills it, draw a card.
CardTextInHand.zhCN: 对一个随从造成$1点伤害，如果死亡缠绕将其杀死，抽一张牌。

FlavorText.enUS: If your spells look like horrifying skulls, let's be honest, you should get to draw some cards.
FlavorText.zhCN: 很久以前，术士们发现只要在普通的法术中加入一点令人作呕的颜色，就能在伤害敌人的同时使其恐惧。真是一举两得。

HowToGetThisCard.esES: Se desbloquea al alcanzar el nivel 4.

HowToGetThisGoldCard.esES: Se desbloquea al alcanzar el nivel 43.

CardTextInHand.enUS: Destroy a friendly minion and deal its Attack damage to all enemy minions.
CardTextInHand.zhCN: 消灭一个友方随从，对所有敌方随从造成等同于其攻击力的伤害。

FlavorText.enUS: Start with a powerful minion and stir in Shadowflame and you have a good time!
FlavorText.zhCN: 始于一个强大的随从，终于一场华丽的浩劫。多么有趣！

CardTextInHand.enUS: Battlecry: Destroy the minions on either side of this minion and gain their Attack and Health.
CardTextInHand.zhCN: 战吼：消灭该随从两侧的随从，并获得他们的攻击力和生命值。

FlavorText.enUS: If you put this into your deck, you WILL lose the trust of your other minions.
FlavorText.zhCN: 如果你把这张牌放到你的套牌中，你就会失去其他随从对你的信任。

CardTextInHand.enUS: Battlecry: Discard a random card.
CardTextInHand.zhCN: 战吼：随机弃一张牌。

FlavorText.enUS: Warlocks have it pretty good.
FlavorText.zhCN: 术士们的假期都很香艳。

HowToGetThisCard.esES: Se desbloquea al alcanzar el nivel 1.

HowToGetThisGoldCard.esES: Se desbloquea al alcanzar el nivel 40.

CardTextInHand.enUS: Deal $4 damage. Discard a random card.
CardTextInHand.zhCN: 造成$4点伤害，随机弃一张牌。

FlavorText.enUS: Are you lighting a soul on fire? Or burning someone with your OWN soul? This seems like an important distinction.
FlavorText.zhCN: 是把别人的灵魂点燃？还是用自己的灵魂把别人点燃？这似乎是有很大区别的。

HowToGetThisCard.esES: Se desbloquea al alcanzar el nivel 6.

HowToGetThisGoldCard.esES: Se desbloquea al alcanzar el nivel 28.

CardTextInHand.enUS: Destroy a minion. Restore #3 Health to your hero.
CardTextInHand.zhCN: 消灭一个随从，为你的英雄恢复#3点生命值。

FlavorText.enUS: You probably should avoid siphoning your own soul. You might create some kind of weird infinite loop.
FlavorText.zhCN: 你最好避免虹吸自己的灵魂，这样会造成一些很奇怪的死循环。

CardTextInHand.enUS: Charge. Battlecry: Discard two random cards.
CardTextInHand.zhCN: 冲锋，战吼：随机弃两张牌。

FlavorText.enUS: Summoning a doomguard is risky. Someone is going to die.
FlavorText.zhCN: 召唤末日守卫有很大的风险。总得有人付出生命的代价。

CardTextInHand.enUS: Destroy all minions.
CardTextInHand.zhCN: 消灭所有随从。

FlavorText.enUS: The Twisting Nether is a formless place of magic and illusion and destroyed minions.
FlavorText.zhCN: 扭曲虚空浩渺无际，充满着魔法、幻象和被放逐的生命体。

CardTextInHand.enUS: Battlecry: Deal 5 damage to your hero.
CardTextInHand.zhCN: 战吼：对你的英雄造成5点伤害。

FlavorText.enUS: Mannoroth, Magtheridon, and Brutallus may be dead, but it turns out there are a LOT of pit lords.
FlavorText.zhCN: 或许玛诺洛斯、玛瑟里顿和布鲁塔卢斯都已经死了，但其实深渊领主还有很多很多。

CardTextInHand.enUS: Your minions cost (2) less, but not less than (1).
CardTextInHand.zhCN: 你的随从牌法力值消耗减少（2）点，但消耗不能少于（1）点。

FlavorText.enUS: NOT LESS THAN 1! Don't get any ideas!
FlavorText.zhCN: 不能少于1点！你在想什么坏主意呢！

CardTextInHand.enUS: Give a friendly minion +4/+4 until end of turn. Then, it dies. Horribly.
CardTextInHand.zhCN: 使一个友方随从获得+4/+4，在回合结束时，将其消灭。

FlavorText.enUS: We cannot even describe how horrible the death is. It's CRAZY bad! Maybe worse than that. Just don't do it.
FlavorText.zhCN: 别让那个随从知道他死后的样子。那惨象无可言状。

CardTextInHand.enUS: Put 2 random Demons from your deck into your hand.
CardTextInHand.zhCN: 从你的牌库中随机将2张恶魔牌置入你的手牌。

FlavorText.enUS: Generally demons are pretty obvious and you don’t need a spell to sense them.
FlavorText.zhCN: 一般说来，恶魔总是比较容易辨认的，不需要用一个法术来感知它们。

CardTextInHand.enUS: You are out of demons! At least there are always imps...
CardTextInHand.zhCN: 你的恶魔用完了！但至少...还有小鬼。

CardTextInHand.enUS: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to your hero.
CardTextInHand.zhCN: 战吼：对你的英雄造成3点伤害。

FlavorText.enUS: Imps like being on fire. They just do.
FlavorText.zhCN: 小鬼们喜欢引火上身。它们就是喜欢。

CardTextInHand.enUS: Deal $2 damage to a character. If that kills it, summon a random Demon.
CardTextInHand.zhCN: 对一个角色造成$2点伤害，如果末日灾祸杀死该角色，随机召唤一个恶魔。

FlavorText.enUS: My advice to you is to avoid Doom, if possible.
FlavorText.zhCN: 福无双至，祸不单行。

CardTextInHand.enUS: Battlecry: Destroy your hero and replace it with Lord Jaraxxus.
CardTextInHand.zhCN: 战吼：消灭你的英雄，并用加拉克苏斯大王替换他。

FlavorText.enUS: TRIFLING GNOME! YOUR ARROGANCE WILL BE YOUR UNDOING!!!!
FlavorText.zhCN: “渺小的侏儒！你们的傲慢将会招致灭亡！”

CardTextInHand.enUS: Silence a minion.
CardTextInHand.zhCN: 沉默一个随从。

FlavorText.enUS: Reserved for enemy spellcasters, evil liches from beyond the grave, and karaoke nights at the Grim Guzzler.
FlavorText.zhCN: 专为施法者设计。施法者包括从墓地里钻出来的邪恶巫妖，也包括在黑铁酒吧里唱卡拉OK的麦霸。

CardTextInHand.enUS: Gain control of an enemy minion with 3 or less Attack until end of turn.
CardTextInHand.zhCN: 直到回合结束，获得一个攻击力小于或等于3的敌方随从的控制权。

FlavorText.enUS: You can rationalize it all you want, it's still a mean thing to do.
FlavorText.zhCN: 随你如何让它恢复理智，这个过程本身仍是件卑劣的事。

CardTextInHand.enUS: This minion's Attack is always equal to its Health.
CardTextInHand.zhCN: 该随从的攻击力等同于其生命值。

FlavorText.enUS: Spawn of the Light? Or Pawn of the Lights?
FlavorText.zhCN: 光耀孕育之子嗣，吾等子嗣之光耀。

CardTextInHand.enUS: Copy 2 cards from your opponent's deck and put them into your hand.
CardTextInHand.zhCN: 复制对手的牌库中的两张牌，并将其置入你的手牌。

FlavorText.enUS: What do you get when you cast Thoughtsteal on an Orc? Nothing! - Tauren joke
FlavorText.zhCN: “人类喜欢说‘对牛弹琴’来形容白费功夫，哼，我们喜欢说‘对兽人使用思维窃取’！”——牛头人长者

CardTextInHand.enUS: At the start of your turn, restore 3 Health to a damaged friendly character.
CardTextInHand.zhCN: 在你的回合开始时，随机为一个受到伤害的友方角色恢复3点生命值。

FlavorText.enUS: It isn't clear if people ignore the Lightwell, or if it is just invisible.
FlavorText.zhCN: 以前有很多牧师都不明白，究竟是因为队友看不见光明之泉呢，还是他们故意不想点它呢？

CardTextInHand.enUS: Put a copy of a random minion from your opponent's deck into the battlefield.
CardTextInHand.zhCN: 随机复制对手的牌库中的一张随从牌，并将其置入战场。

FlavorText.enUS: Sometimes it feels like this is all a game.
FlavorText.zhCN: 有时候你会觉得，一切不过是场游戏。

CardTextInHand.enUS: Mindgames whiffed! Your opponent had no minions!
CardTextInHand.zhCN: 控心术无效！你的对手的牌库中没有随从牌了！

CardTextInHand.enUS: Draw cards until you have as many in hand as your opponent.
CardTextInHand.zhCN: 抽若干数量的牌，直到你的手牌数量等同于你的对手的手牌数量。

FlavorText.enUS: This is not just a favor, but a divine one, like helping someone move a couch with a fold out bed!
FlavorText.zhCN: 这可是神的恩赐，就好像有人在关键时刻向你伸出援手。

CardTextInHand.enUS: Double the damage and healing of your spells and Hero Power.
CardTextInHand.zhCN: 使你的法术牌和英雄技能的伤害和治疗效果翻倍。

FlavorText.enUS: He's been exiled from his home, and all his brothers turned evil, but otherwise he doesn't have a lot to complain about.
FlavorText.zhCN: 他被逐出他的家园。他兄弟们都变成了邪恶的主宰......但是除此之外，他好像也没有什么别的可以抱怨的了。

CardTextInHand.enUS: Restore #8 Health. Draw 3 cards.
CardTextInHand.zhCN: 恢复#8点生命值，抽三张牌。

FlavorText.enUS: A grammatically awkward life saver.
FlavorText.zhCN: 抓住最后一根救命稻草。

CardTextInHand.enUS: Double a minion's Attack.
CardTextInHand.zhCN: 使一个随从的攻击力翻倍。

FlavorText.enUS: This card causes double the trouble AND double the fun.
FlavorText.zhCN: ”攻击翻倍，快乐加倍！“

CardTextInHand.enUS: Change a minion's Attack to 1.
CardTextInHand.zhCN: 使一个随从的攻击力变为1。

FlavorText.enUS: This card makes something really damp. Oh wait. That's Humidity.
FlavorText.zhCN: 这张牌真是会让人的心情很糟糕，就像潮湿阴冷的天气。

HowToGetThisCard.esES: Se desbloquea al alcanzar el nivel 6.

HowToGetThisGoldCard.esES: Se desbloquea al alcanzar el nivel 28.

CardTextInHand.enUS: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion Divine Shield.
CardTextInHand.zhCN: 战吼：使一个其他友方随从获得圣盾。

FlavorText.enUS: I'm not saying you can dodge fireballs. I'm saying with this shield, you won't have to.
FlavorText.zhCN: ”我没说你能够躲过火球。我是说有了这盾，你就不需要躲了。“

CardTextInHand.enUS: Choose a minion. Whenever it attacks, draw a card.
CardTextInHand.zhCN: 选择一个随从，每当它进行攻击时，抽一张牌。

FlavorText.enUS: Apparently with wisdom comes the knowledge that you should probably be attacking every turn.
FlavorText.zhCN: 显然是智慧让他认清了这样一条真理：作为一个随从，每回合都要攻击才能体现其价值。

CardTextInHand.enUS: Draw a card and deal damage equal to its cost.
CardTextInHand.zhCN: 抽一张牌，并造成等同于其法力值消耗的伤害。

FlavorText.enUS: C'mon Molten Giant!!
FlavorText.zhCN: 来个熔核巨人吧！！

CardTextInHand.enUS: Whenever you summon a minion, give it +1/+1 and this loses 1 Durability.
CardTextInHand.zhCN: 每当你召唤一个随从，使它获得+1/+1，这把武器失去1点耐久度。

FlavorText.enUS: I dub you Sir Loin of Beef!
FlavorText.zhCN: 我封你为“牛腰肉爵士”！

CardTextInHand.enUS: Give a minion Divine Shield.
CardTextInHand.zhCN: 使一个随从获得圣盾。

FlavorText.enUS: This spell has been renamed so many times, even paladins don’t know what it should be called anymore.
FlavorText.zhCN: 这个法术的名字已经被修改了太多次，导致连圣骑士们都不知道它应该叫什么了。

HowToGetThisCard.esES: Se desbloquea al alcanzar el nivel 1.

HowToGetThisGoldCard.esES: Se desbloquea al alcanzar el nivel 23.

CardTextInHand.enUS: Secret: When your opponent plays a minion, reduce its Health to 1.
CardTextInHand.zhCN: 奥秘：当你的对手召唤一个随从，使该随从的生命值降为1。

FlavorText.enUS: Repentance often comes in the moment before obliteration. Curious.
FlavorText.zhCN: 忏悔总会在湮灭前一刻到来。多么奥妙。

CardTextInHand.enUS: Battlecry: Change an enemy minion's Attack to 1.
CardTextInHand.zhCN: 战吼：使一个敌方随从的攻击力变为1。

FlavorText.enUS: The Aldor hate two things: the Scryers and smooth jazz.
FlavorText.zhCN: 奥尔多痛恨两样东西：占星者和湿鳞蜥蜴的眼睛。

CardTextInHand.enUS: Divine Shield. Taunt. Deathrattle: Equip a 5/3 Ashbringer.
CardTextInHand.zhCN: 圣盾，嘲讽，亡语：装备一把5/3的灰烬使者。

FlavorText.enUS: If you haven't heard the Tirion Fordring theme song, it's because it doesn't exist.
FlavorText.zhCN: 如果你还没听过《提里奥·弗丁主题曲》，那是因为它还没被谱写出来。

CardTextInHand.enUS: Deal $8 damage randomly split among enemy characters.
CardTextInHand.zhCN: 造成$8点伤害，随机分配给敌方角色。

FlavorText.enUS: Wham! Wham! Wham! Wham! Wham! Wham! Wham! Wham!
FlavorText.zhCN: 打！打！打！打！打！打！打！打！

CardTextInHand.enUS: Taunt. Enrage: +3 Attack
CardTextInHand.zhCN: 嘲讽，激怒：+3攻击力。

FlavorText.enUS: Tauren Warrior: Champion of Mulgore, Slayer of Quilboar, Rider of Thunderbluff Elevators.
FlavorText.zhCN: 牛头人战士：莫高雷勇士，野猪人杀手，雷霆崖电梯发明者。

CardTextInHand.enUS: Deal $2 damage to a minion. If it survives, draw a card.
CardTextInHand.zhCN: 对一个随从造成$2点伤害，如果它依然存活，则抽一张牌。

FlavorText.enUS: Dun da dun, dun da dun: if you've heard an ogre sing this, it's too late.
FlavorText.zhCN: “咚次哒次，咚次哒次”：如果你听到食人魔这样的“歌声”，那已经太晚了。

CardTextInHand.enUS: Draw a card for each damaged friendly character.
CardTextInHand.zhCN: 每有一个受到伤害的友方角色，便抽一张牌。

FlavorText.enUS: You won't like me when I'm angry.
FlavorText.zhCN: “你不会喜欢我生气的样子。”

CardTextInHand.enUS: Enrage: +3 Attack
CardTextInHand.zhCN: 激怒：+3攻击力

FlavorText.enUS: If an Amani berserker asks Joo lookin' at me?!, the correct response is Nah, mon.
FlavorText.zhCN: 如果阿曼尼狂战士问你：“你刚才看着我？！”正确的答案应该是：“没有，伙计。”

CardTextInHand.enUS: Taunt
CardTextInHand.zhCN: 嘲讽

FlavorText.enUS: All these guys ever do is talk about the Thunder King. BOOOORRRINNG!
FlavorText.zhCN: 这些家伙们每天做的就是谈论雷神。真无聊！

CardTextInHand.enUS: Battlecry: Equip a 2/2 weapon.
CardTextInHand.zhCN: 战吼：装备一把2/2的武器。

FlavorText.enUS: 50% off fist weapons, limited time only!
FlavorText.zhCN: 拳套武器限时特惠，第二把半价！

CardTextInHand.enUS: Whenever this minion takes damage, gain +3 Attack.
CardTextInHand.zhCN: 每当该随从受到伤害时，获得+3攻击力。

FlavorText.enUS: No Pain, No Gain.
FlavorText.zhCN: 如果那些伤痛没能让你死掉，它们就会让你更强大。

HowToGetThisGoldCard.deDE: Wird freigeschaltet, wenn Ihr als Hexenmeister Stufe 57 erreicht.
HowToGetThisGoldCard.esES: Se desbloquea al alcanzar el nivel 57 con el brujo.
HowToGetThisGoldCard.esMX: Se desbloquea en nivel 57 de Brujo.

CardTextInHand.enUS: Deal $1 damage to ALL minions.
CardTextInHand.zhCN: 对所有随从造成$1点伤害。

FlavorText.enUS: The way to tell seasoned warriors from novice ones: the novices yell wheeeee while whirlwinding.
FlavorText.zhCN: 分辨资深战士和新手战士的最好办法：新手在用旋风斩时会喊“哇哇哇”。

HowToGetThisCard.esES: Se desbloquea al alcanzar el nivel 6.

HowToGetThisGoldCard.esES: Se desbloquea al alcanzar el nivel 32.

CardTextInHand.enUS: Whenever a friendly minion takes damage, gain 1 Armor.
CardTextInHand.zhCN: 每当一个友方随从受到伤害，便获得1点护甲值。

FlavorText.enUS: She accepts guild funds for repairs!
FlavorText.zhCN: 她接受公会修理资金！

CardTextInHand.enUS: Taunt
CardTextInHand.zhCN: 嘲讽

FlavorText.enUS: Have you seen the size of the shields in this game?? This is no easy job.
FlavorText.zhCN: 你知道这个游戏里的盾牌都有多大吗？那可绝对不是轻松的差事。

CardTextInHand.enUS: Destroy all minions except one. (chosen randomly)
CardTextInHand.zhCN: 随机选择一个随从，消灭除了该随从外的所有其他随从。

FlavorText.enUS: Do you know the first rule of Brawl Club?
FlavorText.zhCN: 你知道搏击俱乐部的第一守则吗？

CardTextInHand.enUS: Deal $4 damage. If you have 12 or less Health, deal $6 instead.
CardTextInHand.zhCN: 造成$4点伤害；如果你的生命值小于或等于12点，则改为造成$6点伤害。

CardTextInHand.zhCN: 对一个随从造成$2点伤害，如果该随从是友方恶魔，则改为使其获得+2/+2。

FlavorText.enUS: Demonfire is like regular fire except for IT NEVER STOPS BURNING HELLLPPP
FlavorText.zhCN: 恶魔之火和普通火焰没什么区别，除了它从来不会熄灭...救命！

CardTextInHand.enUS: At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to this minion and summon a 1/1 Imp.
CardTextInHand.zhCN: 在你的回合结束时，对该随从造成1点伤害，并召唤一个1/1的小鬼。

FlavorText.enUS: She would enjoy the job a lot more if she just could get the imps to QUIT BITING HER.
FlavorText.zhCN: 如果她能让这些小鬼不再咬她的话，她会更加享受这份工作的。

CardTextInHand.enUS: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to a minion and give it +2 Attack.
CardTextInHand.zhCN: 战吼：对一个随从造成1点伤害，并使其获得+2攻击力。

FlavorText.enUS: I'm going to need you to come in on Sunday. - Cruel Taskmaster
FlavorText.zhCN: “这个周末你们必须来加班。”——严酷的监工

CardTextInHand.enUS: Whenever a minion takes damage, gain +1 Attack.
CardTextInHand.zhCN: 每当一个随从受到伤害时，便获得+1攻击力。

FlavorText.enUS: He used to work as an accountant before he tried his hand at Berserkering.
FlavorText.zhCN: 在投身狂战士这份很有前途的工作之前，他是一个会计。

CardTextInHand.enUS: Gain 5 Armor. Draw a card.
CardTextInHand.zhCN: 获得5点护甲值，抽一张牌。

FlavorText.enUS: Shields were invented because Face Block is USELESS.
FlavorText.zhCN: 光有面罩是不够的，所以人们发明了盾牌。

HowToGetThisCard.esES: Se desbloquea al alcanzar el nivel 8.

HowToGetThisGoldCard.esES: Se desbloquea al alcanzar el nivel 28.

CardTextInHand.enUS: Deal $1 damage to a minion and give it +2 Attack.
CardTextInHand.zhCN: 对一个随从造成$1点伤害，该随从获得+2攻击力。

FlavorText.enUS: They're only smiling on the outside.
FlavorText.zhCN: 吃得苦中苦，方为人上人。

CardTextInHand.enUS: Your spells cost (1) less.
CardTextInHand.zhCN: 你的法术的法力值消耗减少（1）点。

FlavorText.enUS: Apprentices are great for bossing around. Conjure me some mana buns! And a coffee! Make that a mana coffee!
FlavorText.zhCN: 学徒们就是用来到处使唤的。“给我做点魔法面包，再来杯咖啡！我要魔法咖啡！”

CardTextInHand.enUS: Secret: When your opponent plays a minion, deal $4 damage to it.
CardTextInHand.zhCN: 奥秘：当你的对手打出一张随从牌时，对该随从造成$4点伤害。

FlavorText.enUS: A great sniper hits the spot. Just like a delicious flank of boar. Mmmmm.
FlavorText.zhCN: 伟大的狙击手总是能够正中目标。就像吃下一整块猪肋排。嗯，味道好极了。

CardTextInHand.enUS: Secret: When your hero is attacked, deal $2 damage to all enemies.
CardTextInHand.zhCN: 奥秘：当你的英雄受到攻击，对所有敌人造成$2点伤害。

FlavorText.enUS: It traps your food AND cooks it for you!
FlavorText.zhCN: 普通陷阱捉到的是猎物；爆炸陷阱捉到的是烤熟的食物！

CardTextInHand.enUS: Secret: When an enemy minion attacks, return it to its owner's hand and it costs (2) more.
CardTextInHand.zhCN: 奥秘：当一个敌方随从进攻时，将其移回其拥有者的手中，并使其法力值消耗增加（2）点。

FlavorText.enUS: Dang, that's cold. - appropriate response to Freezing Trap, or a mean joke.
FlavorText.zhCN: “呃，好冷。”——当你中了冰冻陷阱或是听到一个冷笑话时，通常都是这个反应。

CardTextInHand.enUS: Battlecry: The next Secret you play this turn costs (0).
CardTextInHand.zhCN: 战吼：在本回合中，你使用的下一个奥秘的法力值消耗为（0）点。

FlavorText.enUS: The Kirin Tor reside in the floating city of Dalaran. How do you make a Dalaran float? Two scoops of ice cream, one scoop of Dalaran.
FlavorText.zhCN: 肯瑞托的法师们居住在飘浮之城达拉然。怎样让达拉然飘起来？只要用魔法把氢气球变成透明的就行了。

CardTextInHand.enUS: Combo: Gain +2/+2 for each card played earlier this turn.
CardTextInHand.zhCN: 连击：在本回合中，使用此牌前每打出一张其他牌，便获得+2/+2。

FlavorText.enUS: He led the Stonemasons in the reconstruction of Stormwind, and when the nobles refused to pay, he founded the Defias Brotherhood to, well, deconstruct Stormwind.
FlavorText.zhCN: 他领导石匠协会重建了暴风城，而当贵族们拒绝支付工钱的时候，他将领导迪菲亚兄弟会，嗯，拆掉暴风城。

CardTextInHand.enUS: Whenever you play a card, summon a 2/1 Flame of Azzinoth.
CardTextInHand.zhCN: 每当你使用一张牌时，召唤一个2/1的埃辛诺斯之焰。

FlavorText.enUS: Illidan's brother, Malfurion, imprisoned him beneath Hyjal for 10,000 years. Stormrages are not good at letting go of grudges.
FlavorText.zhCN: 伊利丹的哥哥玛法里奥把他关在海加尔山下长达一万年。怒风两兄弟真是不明白“家和万事兴”的道理。

CardTextInHand.enUS: ALL minions cost (1) more.
CardTextInHand.zhCN: 召唤所有随从的法力值消耗增加（1）点。

FlavorText.enUS: They come out at night to eat leftover mana crystals. Mmmmmm, they say.
FlavorText.zhCN: 它们在晚上出没，吸食残余的法力水晶。“嗯...”它们发出这样的声音。

CardTextInHand.enUS: Destroy a random enemy minion.
CardTextInHand.zhCN: 随机消灭一个敌方随从。

FlavorText.enUS: Accuracy is not a highly valued trait among the mok'nathal. Deadliness is near the top, though.
FlavorText.zhCN: 在莫克纳萨村，瞄得准并不是什么值得称道的本事。最重要的是，能不能给猎物致命的一击。

CardTextInHand.enUS: Change the Health of ALL minions to 1.
CardTextInHand.zhCN: 将所有随从的生命值变为1。

FlavorText.enUS: We are all special unique snowflakes... with 1 Health.
FlavorText.zhCN: 正因为我们都是独一无二的，所以我们都是平等的。

CardTextInHand.enUS: Costs (1) less for each damage your hero has taken.
CardTextInHand.zhCN: 你的英雄每受到1点伤害，这张牌的法力值消耗便减少（1）点。

FlavorText.enUS: He gets terrible heartburn. BECAUSE HE IS FULL OF LAVA.
FlavorText.zhCN: 无数初次来到熔火之心的冒险者倒在他滚烫的脚掌之下。

CardTextInHand.enUS: Restore #4 Health to ALL minions.
CardTextInHand.zhCN: 为所有随从恢复#4点生命值。

FlavorText.enUS: It isn't really a circle.
FlavorText.zhCN: 神圣的象征。

CardTextInHand.enUS: Destroy a minion with an Attack of 5 or more.
CardTextInHand.zhCN: 消灭一个攻击力大于或等于5的随从。

FlavorText.enUS: If you miss, it leaves a lightning-bolt-shaped scar on your target.
FlavorText.zhCN: 如果你的法术没有命中，那么你的目标身上会留下一道闪电形状的伤疤。

FlavorText.zhCN: 他在每周四的夜晚都会悄然出现在猪和哨声旅店担当保镖。

CardTextInHand.enUS: Deal $5 damage. Restore #5 Health to your hero.
CardTextInHand.zhCN: 造成$5点伤害。为你的英雄恢复#5点生命值。

FlavorText.enUS: Often followed by Holy Smokes!
FlavorText.zhCN: 紧接着你就会看到“神圣之烟”！

FlavorText.enUS: If a bright light shines on a priest in Shadowform… do they cast a shadow?
FlavorText.zhCN: 当一道光亮照射在暗影牧师身上...他们的影子会投射在哪里？

CardTextInHand.enUS: Hero PowerDeal 2 damage.
CardTextInHand.zhCN: 英雄技能造成2点伤害。

CardTextInHand.enUS: Hero PowerDeal 3 damage.
CardTextInHand.zhCN: 英雄技能造成3点伤害。

FlavorText.enUS: Zombie. It's what's for dinner.
